mapper.select: SELECT P.FG_POST_ID AS fgPostId, P.FG_POST_TITLE AS fgPostTitle, P.FG_USER_CODE AS fgUserCode, NU.FG_NORMAL_NAME AS fgNormalName, R.FG_RECIPE_INGREDIENTS AS fgReceipeIngredients, R.FG_RECIPE_TIME AS fgReceipeTime, R.FG_RECIPE_CONTENT AS fgReceipeContent FROM FG_POST P JOIN FG_NORMAL_USER NU ON P.FG_USER_CODE = NU.FG_USER_CODE JOIN FG_RECIPE R ON P.FG_POST_ID = R.FG_POST_ID WHERE P.FG_POST_TYPE = 'recipe' and p.fg_post_id = #{fgPostId}

SELECT P.FG_POST_ID AS fgPostId, P.FG_POST_TYPE AS fgPostType, F.FG_POST_FILE_ID AS fgPostFileId, P.FG_POST_TITLE AS fgPostTitle, R.FG_RECIPE_TIME AS fgReceipeTime, P.FG_POST_LIKES AS fgLikes FROM FG_POST P LEFT JOIN FG_RECIPE R ON P.FG_POST_ID = R.FG_POST_ID LEFT JOIN FG_POST_FILE F ON P.FG_POST_ID = F.FG_POST_ID WHERE P.FG_POST_TYPE = 'recipe' ORDER BY P.FG_POST_CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FG_POST ( FG_POST_ID, FG_POST_TYPE, FG_POST_TITLE, FG_POST_CREATED_AT, FG_POST_LIKES, FG_POST_VIEWS, FG_POST_EDIT, FG_USER_CODE ) VALUES ( #{fgPostId}, #{fgPostType}, #{fgPostTitle}, SYSDATE, #{fgLikes}, 0, '0', #{fgUserCode} )

select SEQ_FG_POST.currval from dual
FG_POST_ID, FG_RECIPE_INGREDIENTS, FG_RECIPE_TIME, FG_RECIPE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{fgPostId}, #{fgReceipeIngredients}, #{fgReceipeTime}, #{fgReceipeContent} )

select SEQ_FG_POST_FILE.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO FG_POST_FILE ( FG_POST_FILE_ID, FG_POST_FILE_NAME, FG_POST_FILE_ROOT, FG_POST_FILE_UUID, FG_POST_FILE_TIME, FG_POST_ID ) VALUES ( #{fgPostFileId}, #{fgPostFileName}, #{fgPostFileRoot}, #{fgPostFileUUID}, SYSDATE, #{fgPostId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE FG_POST SET FG_POST_TITLE = #{fgPostTitle}, FG_POST_EDIT = '1' WHERE FG_POST_ID = #{fgPostId}
UPDATE FG_RECIPE SET FG_RECIPE_INGREDIENTS = #{fgReceipeIngredients}, FG_RECIPE_TIME = #{fgReceipeTime}, FG_RECIPE_CONTENT = #{fgReceipeContent} WHERE FG_POST_ID = #{fgPostId}
